sources.title: A Holiday Romance | Full Christmas Movie | Naomi Judd | Happy Holidays
sources.description:
A Holiday Romance - A superintendent must fire the town's favorite music teacher to meet budget cuts. But a romance grows between them, and through the power of music, he discovers how instrumental a single individual can become in our lives.
1999.  Stars: Naomi Judd, Gerald McRaney, Alison Pill, Andy Griffith

metadata.Plot: A staid school administrator comes to town to save a school from closing and ends up falling in love with the charming music teacher.
metadata.Actors: Naomi Judd, Gerald McRaney, Alison Pill
